titleInfo.title: Soluble models for dynamics driven by a super-diffusive noise

mods.abstract: We explicitly discuss scalar Langevin type of equations where the deterministic part is linear, but where the integrated noise source is a non-linear diffusion process exhibiting superdiffusive behavior. We calculate transient and stationary probabilities and study the possibility of noise induced transitions from a unimodal to a bimodal probability shape. Illustrations from finance and dynamical systems are given. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
